definitions.definition: cause to go or be taken to a particular destination; arrange for the delivery of, especially by mail.
examples: we sent a reminder letter but received no reply
synonyms: cable "they sent a message to HQ"

definitions.definition: cause (a message or computer file) to be transmitted electronically.
examples: send your document as a PDF attachment

definitions.definition: order or instruct to go to a particular destination or in a particular direction.
examples: Clemons sent me to Bangkok for R&R
he sent to invite her to supper

definitions.definition: cause to move sharply or quickly; propel.
examples: the volcano sent clouds of ash up four miles into the air
synonyms: let fly; informalchuck "the pump sent out a jet of steam"

definitions.definition: arrange for someone to go to (an institution) and stay there for a particular purpose.
examples: many parents prefer to send their children to single-sex schools

definitions.definition: affect with powerful emotion; put into ecstasy.
examples: it's the spectacle and music that send us, not the words
